channel.title: Archlinux on S. M. Nazmul Hasan
channel.description: Recent content in Archlinux on S. M. Nazmul Hasan

item.title: How to Add User Dirs in Arch Linux
item.description: Run the following commands line by line sudo pacman -S xdg-user-dirs xdg-user-dirs-update Reference: ArchWiki

item.title: How to Fix No Trash on Arch Linux
item.description: Install the gvfs package by running the following command sudo pacman -S gvfs

item.title: How to Connect Wi Fi in Vanilla Arch
item.description: Connect wifi during installation wpa_supplicant -B -i wlan0 -c <(wpa_passphrase "ssid" "passphrase") Conntect WiFi on first boot N.B: Required Network Manager nmcli device wifi connect Your_SSID password Your_Password
